definition: to deal in/to buy and sell/to trade in/to retail/to peddle
to sell/to make or carry out (a plan or intrigue etc)

sentences.english: The vendor, who also peddles pet turtles, says she is selling more of the stuff these days.
sentences.chinese: 販售小甲魚的攤販告訴我們，她最近賣得比往日好。

sentences.english: You can buy all these beautiful accessories off-the-shelf.
sentences.chinese: 這些漂亮的飾品都有成品在販售。

sentences.english: Katydids for sale this month at a market in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 在北京一個市場內販售的蟈蟈。

sentences.english: It's the perfect tool for bootlegging your favorite summer concerts (with permission from the sound guy).
sentences.chinese: 這是爲販售私酒您喜愛的夏天音樂會的完善的工具。

definition: dealer/trader/person engaged in some industry or trade
to sell/to betray/to spare no effort/to show off or flaunt
to belong or be dedicated exclusively to/proprietary/private/personal
